title: [Feat]: Support for signing in using security key
body:
### Describe the feature

Allow users to sign in using USB security key

### Motivation

I'm not sure if this is a feature request or a bug report, because it appears to work partially: the key signon option is available and when selected, the key is blinking, but the necessary pop-up prompts for the pin, touch, and and the account selection are hidden.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
